title: First post in the history of ever, or: "am i a narcissist?"
content:
im writing this piece of shit from scratch using google cloud platform which i genuinely despise like i dont even have javascript enabled on one of my computers and i especially do not connect to google domains on the thing lol.
anyway lucky for you you get to hear the awesome tales of my incredible yet envied lifestyle.
talk to you guys soon â™¥
name: narcissist
description: a brief rundown i made to test my handmade CMS. not worth a read!
